ResourceEnum.Name: VrrpReturnStatus
ResourceEnum.Resource: %% Error: VRID does not exist (cannot delete)
%% Error: Session is already enabled
%% Error: Session is already disabled
%% Error: Malformed IP address
%% Error: Cannot find specified interface
%% Error: VRRP interface has no IP addresses
%% Error: MUST configure virtual IP address first
%% Error: MUST be virtual IP owner to have priority 255
%% Error: IP Address owner priority MUST be 255
%% Error: Virtual Router configuration incomplete (not enabled)
%% Error: Unexpected error enabling
%% Error: Unexpected error disabling
%% Error: VRRP router priority mismatch (IP owner priority is 255)
%% Error: Must unset Virtual IP first
%% Error: Virtual IP address not found; Cannot set default 'master'
%% Error: Virtual IP address exists; Cannot set default 'backup'
%% Error: Interface must have VIP master address.
%% Error: The VRRP session does not exist
%% Error: Duplicate VRRP session
%% Error: Cannot reefine the \"old style\" VRRP session
%% Error: Cannot attach the session to the interface
%% Error: No such interface
%% Error: Virtual IPv6 address must be link local addres
%% Error: Same Virtual IP is already configured
%% Error: Trackport cannot be enabled on the interface on which this session is configured
%% Error: Group Track Priority cannot be greater than Priority set
%% Error: Max number of tracked interfaces reached
%% Error: Works only in VRRPE mode
%% Error: The Virtual IP Address does not exist
%% Error: This port is already being tracked
%% Error: This port is not being tracked
%% Error: Max number of Virtual IPs have been configured
%% Error: VRRPE: Interface IP and Virtual IP cannot be the same
%% Error: Virtual IP address should involve the Interface IP prefix
%% Error: VRRP config is globally disabled
%% Error: VRRP session is not configured
%% Error: Only Owning Virtual IP address can be configured on Owner session
%% Error: Owning Virtual IP address can not be configured on Non-Owner session
%% Error: Trackport can not be configured on Owner
%% Error: Session can not be configured as Owner when track port is enabled
%% Error: VRRP config is globally disabled
%% Error: VRRPE config is globally disabled
%% Error: VRRP cannot be configured on a Switchport
%% Error: Maximum number of VRRP Sessions already configured
%% Error: Maximum number of allowed VRRP Sessions on this interface has already been configured
%% Error: VRRP Interface is shut; Cannot configure Virtual-IP
%% Error: Interface is not in L3 mode.
%% Error: VRRPE Config in VCS mode is allowed only on Vlan Interfaces
%% Error: VRRP config is globally enabled. Disable it first.
%% Error: VRRPE config is globally enabled. Disable it first.
%% Error: VRRPE is not supported on this platform.
%% Error: Unknown VRRP API error
